pr_title: Fix XContentTypeTests where version was a negative byte

timeline.message:
Fix XContentTypeTests where version was a negative byte

a random byte could be -128 and when used with Math.abs it would result
in an int 128. That in turn when casting back to byte would overflow and
result in -128 again.
Fixed with a randomNonNegativeByte method

closes #63342

timeline.author: rjernst
